TopicTitle: Anyone want to hop on Kerbal Live Feed with me? Updated for 0.25

Articles.Content:
0.25 version here

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24926-0-21-Kerbal-LiveFeed-Passive-Multiplayer-Plugin-Client-Server-v0-7-1?p=1520687&viewfull=1#post1520687

KLF is a passive multiplayer mod that allows for chat, the sharing of positions within the Kerbol system, crafts, and screenshots! It's a great mod that has been straggling along since 0.21 since the OP abandoned it.

DMP is built on KLF code, its basically DMP without the direct multiplayer part (you cannot see other ships ingame). Come play!

There's a server running @ gaterunner.com

URRRA!

Woohoo! It's been SOOO long since I used KLF because all the servers were down. Can't wait to play it again! See you there!
I'd love to hop in as well, but I'm afraid my time zone doesn't coincide with other players'.
